name: Girl Genius and the Rats of Mechanicsburg
blurb: An iOS and Android game of physics and action in the steampunk world of Girl Genius\u00ae!

rewards.reward: CITIZEN OF MECHANICSBURG (ANDROID EDITION): A copy of The Rats of Mechanicsburg game for Android, including exclusive in-game content--25% more gameplay, not available any other way! Exclusive access to a pre-release forum to interact with the developers. Your name listed in a roll of honor in the game.

CITIZEN OF MECHANICSBURG: Exclusive in-game content--25% more gameplay, not available any other way! Exclusive access to a pre-release forum to interact with the developers. Your name listed in a roll of honor in the game. BONUS APP: The Girl Genius Paper Doll, featuring Krosp, Zeetha, Agatha and Gil (plus all future DLC).\r\n\r\n(Note:This reward does not include a copy of The RATS of Mechanicsburg game itself. See the text to the left for the reason why.)

MINION OF MECHANICSBURG (ANDROID EDITION): All Citizen (Android) rewards, plus: Special recognition in the roll of honor. Digital portfolio of game concept and production artwork. Exclusive copper-finish medal identifying you as one of the Heterodyne's most loyal minions!

MINION OF MECHANICSBURG\r\nAll Citizen rewards, plus: Special recognition in the roll of honor. Digital portfolio of game concept and production artwork. Exclusive copper-finish medal  identifying you as one of the Heterodyne's most loyal minions!

SCHOLAR OF MECHANICSBURG All Minion rewards, plus: The first eleven volumes of Girl Genius, in PDF form! These DRM-free PDFs can be read offline or even loaded onto most e-readers, and are the perfect way to get caught up on the history of Agatha, Krosp, Mechanicsburg and the rest of the Girl Genius universe. Also included is a 12th bonus volume, The Secret Blueprints, giving more background on the characters and world.

SCHOLAR OF MECHANICSBURG (ANDROID EDITION): All Minion (Android) rewards, plus: The first eleven volumes of Girl Genius, in PDF form! These DRM-free PDFs can be read offline or even loaded onto most e-readers, and are the perfect way to get caught up on the history of Agatha, Krosp, Mechanicsburg and the rest of the Girl Genius universe. Also included is a 12th bonus volume, The Secret Blueprints, giving more background on the characters and world.

BURGERMEISTER OF MECHANICSBURG (ANDROID EDITION): All Scholar (Android) rewards, plus: Special recognition in the roll of honor. Your medal is silver-finished rather than copper. Exclusive stein, featuring full-color art and identifying you as one of Mechanicsburg's most eminent citizens. Plus, all our Burgermeisters will get the chance to interact with the developers on ideas for our *next* Girl Genius game!

BURGERMEISTER OF MECHANICSBURG\r\nAll Scholar rewards, plus: Special recognition in the roll of honor. Your medal is silver-finished rather than copper. Exclusive stein, featuring full-color art and identifying you as one of Mechanicsburg's most eminent citizens. Plus, all our Burgermeisters will get the chance to interact with the developers on ideas for our *next* Girl Genius game!

HETERODYNE LAB ASSISTANT, JUNIOR GRADE\r\nAll Burgermeister rewards, plus: BETA TESTER! Receive a beta copy of the game before release, which will update to the final copy of the game once we launch. Special recognition in the roll of honor, plus listing in the game credits as a beta tester. Your medal is gold-finished rather than copper or silver.

HETERODYNE LAB ASSISTANT, SENIOR GRADE\r\nAll Junior Grade rewards, plus: ALPHA TESTER! Receive an alpha copy of the game* well before release, rich with unique and fascinating bugs to discover! This copy will update to the beta and release versions as they become available. Special recognition in the roll of honor, plus listing in the game credits as an alpha tester. One piece of original game concept art--the actual sketches used to create the game models, signed by Phil or by the entire development team (your choice). *Alpha copies are tied to specific devices, so you will have to provide us the UDID of your iPhone or iPad.

ESTEEMED FELLOW SPARK\r\nAll Senior Grade rewards except the game sketch. Instead, your name will appear in the comic, and you will receive Phil's signed original 11x17 artwork for that day's page! In addition, you and a friend can join us at the game's wrap party in Seattle (you'll need to provide your own transportation and lodging). Or, if you can't make it to Seattle, talk to us and we'll come up with some other way to thank you for your support!
